items.sentence: No one knows whether there will be a war in the Middle East.
I copied in my notebook whatever he wrote on the blackboard.
Even though it meant risking danger, he decided to go there.
It was heartless of him to say such a thing to the sick man.
A high degree of specialization is required in that company.
As far as the teacher was concerned, she was a joy to teach.
This book says that elephants live to be over 100 years old.
It is strange that you should know nothing about the matter.
Covered with dust, the doll stood in the corner of the room.
Tom warned me not to say anything to Mary about what we did.
Please put your shoes in the shoebox when you take them off.
I've told Tom many times that smoking is bad for his health.
When Tom was younger, he used to play basketball quite well.
There's nothing more fun for me to do than to talk with Tom.
What kind of work did you do when you were living in Boston?
I'd rather live in peaceful poverty than in wealth and fear.
The woman who was sitting between Tom and Mary is my mother.
I've already forgotten what I was going to remind you to do.
The explanations are too elaborate and should be simplified.
I don't have any more room on my shelves for any more books.
